title: The Shawshank Redemption
summary: Wrongly accused banker Andy Dufresne bonds with Red in Shawshank Prison. Stars Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman.

title: The Godfather
summary: The rise of Michael Corleone in a powerful mafia family. Stars Marlon Brando and Al Pacino.

title: The Dark Knight
summary: Batman faces the Joker in a gripping Gotham tale. Stars Christian Bale and Heath Ledger.

title: Schindler's List
summary: Oskar Schindler saves Jewish lives during the Holocaust. Stars Liam Neeson and Ben Kingsley.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary: Frodo completes his quest to destroy the One Ring. Stars Elijah Wood and Ian McKellen.

title: Pulp Fiction
summary: Interwoven tales of crime in LA. Stars John Travolta, Uma Thurman, and Samuel L. Jackson.

title: Forrest Gump
summary: Forrest lives a unique life influencing history. Stars Tom Hanks and Robin Wright.

title: Fight Club
summary: A disillusioned man forms an underground fight club. Stars Brad Pitt and Edward Norton.

title: Inception
summary: A thief enters dreams to steal secrets. Stars Leonardo DiCaprio and Joseph Gordon-Levitt.

title: The Matrix
summary: Neo discovers the truth of the Matrix. Stars Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, and Carrie-Anne Moss.

title: Se7en
summary: Detectives hunt a killer using seven deadly sins. Stars Brad Pitt and Morgan Freeman.

title: Gladiator
summary: A betrayed general seeks vengeance in Rome. Stars Russell Crowe and Joaquin Phoenix.

title: Interstellar
summary: A team explores space to save humanity. Stars Matthew McConaughey and Anne Hathaway.

title: Parasite
summary: A poor family infiltrates a wealthy household. Stars Song Kang-ho and Lee Sun-kyun.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
summary: Luke Skywalker fights the Empire. Stars Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, and Carrie Fisher.

title: Goodfellas
summary: Henry Hill chronicles his life in the mob. Stars Ray Liotta, Robert De Niro, and Joe Pesci.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
summary: FBI trainee seeks help from Hannibal Lecter. Stars Jodie Foster and Anthony Hopkins.

title: Casablanca
summary: A love story during World War II. Stars Humphrey Bogart and Ingrid Bergman.

title: Jurassic Park
summary: Dinosaurs come alive in a theme park. Stars Sam Neill, Laura Dern, and Jeff Goldblum.

title: Titanic
summary: A love story aboard the doomed Titanic. Stars Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet.

title: Avatar
summary: Humans and Na'vi clash on Pandora. Stars Sam Worthington and Zoe Saldana.

title: Avengers: Endgame
summary: Avengers battle Thanos to restore balance. Stars Robert Downey Jr. and Chris Evans.

title: The Incredibles
summary: A family of superheroes balances life and duty. Stars Craig T. Nelson and Holly Hunter.

title: The Lion King
summary: A lion cub becomes a king. Stars Matthew Broderick and James Earl Jones.
